00017 package srgcwscs;
00018 
00019 import java.util.ArrayList;
00020 import java.io.FileReader;
00021 import java.io.IOException;
00022 import java.util.Scanner;
00023 
00037 public class TestsPlanner 
00038 {
00039 
00043     private String testsFilePath;
00044     
00048     private ArrayList<Test> list;
00049 
00055     public TestsPlanner(String path) 
00056     {
00057         testsFilePath = path;
00058         list = new ArrayList<Test>();
00059     }
00060 
00066     public ArrayList<Test> getTestsList() 
00067     {
00068         try 
00069         {
00070             FileReader reader = new FileReader(testsFilePath);
00071             Scanner in = new Scanner(reader);
00072             // The two first lines (lines 0 and 1) of this file are like this:
00073             //# instance | vCap | maxRouteCosts | serviceCosts | maxTime(sec) | nIterRandCWS | nSols | distribution | betaMin | betaMax | randomGenerator 
00074             //A-n32-k5     100      10000000          0              120           1000          1          t            0.1      0.2         java          
00075             while (in.hasNextLine()) 
00076             {    
00077                 String s = in.next();
00078                 
00079                  if (s.charAt(0) != '#') // this is a comment line
00080                  {                    
00081                          String instance = s;  
00082                      int maxRouteCost = in.nextInt();
00083                      int serviceCosts = in.nextInt();
00084                      int maxTime = in.nextInt();
00085                      int nIterRandCWS = in.nextInt();
00086                      int nSols = in.nextInt();
00087                      String distribution = in.next();
00088                      float min = in.nextFloat();
00089                      float max = in.nextFloat();
00090                      //For PCs that haven't put American lenguage as Regional lenguage
00091 //                     float min=Float.parseFloat(in.next());
00092 //                     float max=Float.parseFloat(in.next());
00093                      String randomGenerator = in.next();
00094                      boolean useLecuyer = false;
00095                      if (randomGenerator.equalsIgnoreCase("lecuyer")) 
00096                      {
00097                          useLecuyer = true;
00098                      }                   
00099                      int seed = in.nextInt();
00100                      //If seed is 0 , get seed value of MAC address
00101                      if(seed==0){
00102                          MACSeed rand= new MACSeed();
00103                          seed=rand.getSeedOfMAC();                       
00104                      }
00105                      Test aTest = new Test(instance, maxRouteCost, serviceCosts, maxTime, nIterRandCWS, nSols, distribution, min, max, useLecuyer, seed);
00106                      list.add(aTest);
00107                      in.nextLine();
00108                  }
00109                  else
00110                  {
00111                         in.nextLine();
00112                  }
00113              }
00114              in.close();
00115          } catch (IOException exception) {
00116              System.out.println("Error processing tests file: " + exception);
00117          }
00118 
00119         return list;
00120     }
00121 }
